name: 林含怡
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
Week 1: Course Introduction
Week 2: Unit 1 The Science of Sound/ Earworms
Week 3: Unit 1 The Science of Sound/ How We Use Sound
Week 4: Unit 2 In the Garden/ Tokyo Farmer
Week 5: Unit 2 In the Garden/ My Invisible Garden
Week 6: Unit 3 Children and Manners/ Manners: Do Children Really Need Them?
Week 7: Unit 3 Children and Manners/ The Nanny Diaries
Week 8: Review & Midterm Exam 
Week 9: Midterm Proficiency Test
Week 10: Unit 4 Tall Trees/ The Biggest Trees on Earth
Week 11: Unit 4 Tall Trees/ Up a Tree
Week 12: Unit 5 The Time of Your Life/ On Turning Ten
Week 13: Unit 5 The Time of Your Life/ A New Take on the Golden Years
Week 14: Unit 6 Food of Thought/ Feeding the Children Well
Week 15: Unit 6 Food of Thought/ Meet Under Fire
Week 16: No class
Week 17: Review & Final Exam
Week 18: Final Proficiency Test
scorePolicy:
Midterm exam 15%
Final exam 20% 
English proficiency exams 15% + 15%
Group presentation 15%
Class activities & quizzes 10%
Attendance & participation 10%
materials: Savage, A. & Wiese, D. (2011) Real Reading 4: Creating an Authentic Reading Experience. Pearson Education.
